name: "Colorful Grand Gift Box"
description: A massive gift box conceptualized by Pusaq in response to the request: "create something big, bold, and awe-inspiring to serve as a spray painting subject." It is said this gift box possesses a vast internal volume and a uniquely absorptive structure that is capable of devouring paint with insatiable glee. So, cast aside hesitation, let your colors fly, and revel in the joy of uninhibited spray painting!
